clinical_study.brief_title: The Feasibility of Different Doses of Etomidate Admixed With Propofol in Induced Abortion: A Randomized, Double Blind Controlled Trial

lead_sponsor.agency: Third Affiliated Hospital of Zhengzhou University

clinical_study.source: Third Affiliated Hospital of Zhengzhou University

brief_summary.textblock: To explore the feasibility of different doses of etomidate admixed with propofol in induced abortion: a randomized, double blind controlled trial.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline (before the injection of propofol or mixture of propofol and etomidate) to 10 min after the injection
primary_outcome.description: Heart rate will be recorded immediately when the patient arrived at the operating room, 2 min, 4 min, 6 min, 8 min and 10 minutes after the the injection of propofol or mixture of propofol and etomidate.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline (before the injection of propofol or mixture of propofol and etomidate) to 10 min after the injection
primary_outcome.description: Blood pressure will be recorded immediately when the patient arrived at the operating room, 2 min, 4 min, 6 min, 8 min and 10 minutes after the the injection of propofol or mixture of propofol and etomidate.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline (before the injection of propofol or mixture of propofol and etomidate) to 10 min after the injection
primary_outcome.description: Pulse oxygen saturation will be recorded immediately when the patient arrived at the operating room, 2 min, 4 min, 6 min, 8 min and 10 minutes after the the injection of propofol or mixture of propofol and etomidate.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from baseline to discharge from the hospital, expected to no more than 1 hour
secondary_outcome.description: The following point-in-time will be recorded to calculated the period from the injection of propofol or mixture of propofol and etomidate: disappearance of eyelash reflex, injection of supplementary propofol or mixture of propofol and etomidate, awaking, obeying commands, discharge. Anesthesia time was defined as the period from disappearance of eyelash reflex to awaking.

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose of propofol or mixture of propofol and etomidate
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the injection of propofol or mixture of propofol and etomidate to the last supplement of hypnotic agents, expected to be no more than 5 min
from the injection of propofol or mixture of propofol and etomidte to discharge from the hospital, expected to no more than 1 hour

secondary_outcome.measure: Verbal rating scales of uterine contraction
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from 5 min after the operation to discharge from the hospital, expected to be no more than 1 hour
secondary_outcome.description: Verbal rating scales of uterine contraction should be recorded at 5 min, 15 min after the operation and before discharge from the hospital

secondary_outcome.measure: Satisfaction degree of the patient, the surgeon and the anesthetist
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 10 min before discharge from the hospital
secondary_outcome.description: Satisfaction degree will be rated as excellent, good and poor based on a scale of 1 to 10. Excellent is 8 to 10, good is 5 to 7 and poor is 1 to 4.

arm_group.description: In group A, propofol (1%) was mixed with etomidate in the ration of 1:1 (volume). The mixture will be injected continuously until the eyelash reflex disappears. During the operation, supplementary mixture will be administered if the patient has spontaneous movement that hampered the conduct of the procedure.

In group B, propofol (1%) was mixed with etomidate in the ration of 7:5 (volume). The mixture will be injected continuously until the eyelash reflex disappears. During the operation, supplementary mixture will be administered if the patient has spontaneous movement that hampered the conduct of the procedure.

In group C, propofol (1%) will be injected continuously until the eyelash reflex disappears. During the operation, supplementary propofol will be administered if the patient has spontaneous movement that hampered the conduct of the procedure.

intervention.description: Every patient enrolled in the study will be given 15 mg pentazocine before induction.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Aged between 20 and 35 years
- American Society of Anesthesiology (ASA) Physical Status: Ⅰ or Ⅱ
- Singleton pregnancy and the gestational period is 6 to 8 weeks
- Expected operation duration is within 60 minutes
- The body weight should be within 15% around the standard weight
- Signed informed consent form
Exclusion Criteria:
- Serious cardiac, cerebral, liver, kidney, lung, endocrine disease
- Upper respiratory infections within 4 weeks
- Long use of hormone or history of adrenal suppression
- History of use of glucocorticoids, aprotinin or immunosuppressant
- Manifestation of immunodeficiency
- History of use of sedatives or opiates
- Needs of Neuromuscular blocker (except intubation)
- Allergy to trial drug or other contraindication
- Pregnant or breast-feeding women
- Attended other trial past 30 days
